name: Coach Bus Simulator 3D: Driving School Game
name_original: Coach Bus Simulator 3D: Driving School Game
description:
The most awaited bus simulator game is here now with unique gameplay in a PRO version. NO ADS! 100% COMPLETE GAME!

Big Bus Simulator 2018 is the latest simulation game that will offer you the chance to become a real bus driver! Experience the thrill of driving modern coach in NY city. Drive next-gen bus to transport citizens and tourists around the metro city. Learn to drive bus with precision at the driving school and be an ultimate coach driver. As a bus driver your duty is to transport passengers between the terminals around the modern city. Drive bus through traffic rush and avoid collision to reach destination on time. Get on board and drive euro bus on all routes transporting civilians throughout suburban town of NY.

Drive coach through the metropolis and take tourists from a city to another, show them amazing places and landscapes. Experience driving a variety of vehicles including: city coach, double decker and school bus models in one of the best driving games of 2018. There are many transit routes to complete across the big city. Take the passengers from metro station and drive them to their destinations in different parts of the metropolis. Get behind the wheel of next-gen city transport and drop off citizens at metro stations across the town & cities. To become a real bus captain follow traffic rules and stop at red light to avoid accident in this bus simulator 2018. Drive multiple transit bus models in ultra realistic open world environment. Highly detailed transit bus vehicles with complex interiors will make you feel like driving a bus!

Game Features:
Pick and drop passengers and tourists around the modern city
Unlock multiple vehicles as you progress in game
Real driver job of transporting passengers & tourists at multiple stations
Drive in the city, mountain and highway
Many detailed vehicles (modern coach, double decker, school bus)
AI Traffic: new smooth vehicles, realistic physics and brakes
Smooth steering wheel, buttons or tilting controls
Detailed modern coach Interiors with animations

Enjoy the unique gameplay and give your feedback to help us improve this game in future releases
